scripts.say: The barrier above us seems to have disappeared.
Since we passed through the barrier, there would be no point for Tester to waste the energy to keep it going.
Th-thank goodness... I never want to go through that room ever again.
This place is also pretty spacious. Where's the Headquarters building?
Let's send out our recon planes as usual... Um, huh? How come I can't call them out?
It seems that our aircraft can only fly near the surface of the ocean. We're in trouble now... how are we going to find our way?
Everyone, look at the ocean! Is that... obsidian... and lava?!
By lava, do you mean magma? Is a hotspot suddenly forming above the ocean?
That's simply impossible in our world! There's no way for magma to just show up on the ocean!
No matter how powerful the Sirens are, they've never been able to casually violate the laws of nature!
Ah, is that tower-like building the observation deck that Matsuri created?
If we get onto that observation deck, we'll be able to survey the sea and its surroundings.
Well, I don't know how much farther we're going to be able to see...
But doing something is better than doing nothing.
